channel.title: Right Way to portforward?
channel.description: I tryed the guide here on moparscape and it doesnt work. if there is any1 who hosts a server and is using a linlsys wired router let me know what the ports are :S cant get this to work

item.title: Right Way to portforward?
item.dc:creator: @Rastafarai Rastafarai
item.description:
@Rastafarai wrote:

Hey , i had same problem , now gotted all work !

Go To The connection logo , u know next to clock and so ?
ok so go there and look the first ip in suport, add this in portforward !
Then it should be work , it worked for me like that

In Support -> 1 Ip Adress -> Type it to the portforward IP

And Port Start Ports end both are 43594 !

App - Whatever u want

And it gotta be TCP !

Then it should work !

Read full topic
